Commentary: slips this down leg, messy effort by Pant means they'll also get an extra run
thumped into the gap at extra cover! Juicy half-volley, Avishka couldn't have asked for a better delivery first up
Commentary_short: Bumrah to WIA Fernando, FOUR runs

Commentary: cuts him into two halves! Shortens his length, nips back in a long way to beat the inside edge as he looks to punch on the up.
Commentary_short: Bumrah to WIA Fernando, no run

Commentary: dabs this wide of gully, down to third man
length on middle, hint of movement away, defended
flicks this full delivery to mid-on
play and a miss! Moves away and across the left-hander, good take this by Pant diving to his left
squared him up, beauty! Beaten
Commentary_short: Thakur to WIA Fernando, no run

Commentary: bunts this short of length delivery to point
Commentary_short: Thakur to WIA Fernando, no run

Commentary: moves away off the seam from length outside off, pushed to cover point
Commentary_short: Thakur to WIA Fernando, no run

Commentary: punched down the ground, wonderful timing. Bisects mid-on and mid-off.
Commentary_short: Thakur to WIA Fernando, FOUR runs

Commentary: half-volley sliding down, scoring opportunity missed but it's a wide
uppish but doesn't carry to cover. Looking to once again hit through the line, got it high on the bat. Good effort ball
Commentary_short: Thakur to WIA Fernando, no run

Commentary: falls short of mid-on! Looking to pull but got it off the toe-end
Commentary_short: Thakur to WIA Fernando, no run

Commentary: slips this length ball down leg, through to Pant
pulled but not in control, good stop by Sundar at midwicket
bunts this to backward point. Iyer manning that region in Jadeja's absence
length ball angling away, taps this behind the wicket, Pant slightly late to move and they steal a single
driven on the up, Bumrah put his left hand out at mid-off but this bounced over him. Tracerbullet stuff
Commentary_short: Saini to WIA Fernando, FOUR runs

Commentary: punched to cover, tighter line and length
Commentary_short: Saini to WIA Fernando, no run

Commentary: hammered! Two bounces to the midwicket fence. Short at 142.2kph, sped to the boundary at over 200kph (just joking). Imperious pull
Commentary_short: Saini to WIA Fernando, FOUR runs

Commentary: square drive out of the top drawer. Bowled full at 145.5kph, right into his slot and he put that away beautifully
slower delivery, beaten as he looks to run this down to third man
cutter, beaten as this moves away off the deck to square him up
rapped on the glove as he looks to pull, they'll scamper across for a single. Cramped for room
beaten as he looks to squeeze this wide yorker to third man. Swung away late. 144.6kph on the speedgun
Commentary_short: Bumrah to WIA Fernando, no run

Commentary: flicked into the midwicket boundary with a touch of arrogance! Can't bowl there, Boom
Commentary_short: Bumrah to WIA Fernando, FOUR runs

Commentary: reverse-swept past short third man, superb batting this. What a welcome, this will challenge Sundar
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Gunathilaka, FOUR runs

Commentary: slaps this to long-off
flatter on middle, punched to deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to WIA Fernando, 1 run

Commentary: drifting into middle and leg, tucked to midwicket for a quick single

hit straight to mid-off, good catch! Looks to step out and clear the infield, didn't hit it as well as he would've liked. Bat face turned in his hand, Saini at six feet and little more wasn't going to drop that.
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to WIA Fernando, OUT
Dismissal_text: WIA Fernando c Saini b Washington Sundar 22 (16b 5x4 0x6) SR: 137.50

Commentary: tucks this wide of short fine to get off the mark
shortish on middle and leg, tucked to deep square
slower and fuller, thumped down the ground, beats mid-off
backs away and slaps this, cover point fielder gets a hand on it to take the pace off. Sundar with the save
off the pad as he attempts to whip it to square leg, rolls behind the stumps
tucks this to short fine, cramped for room. Good bowling
knuckleball on leg stump, worked to deep square
bunts this to cover
makes room and punches to cover
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Gunathilaka, no run

Commentary: backs away to slog, toe-ends it to long-off
reverse swept, but this is a good stop by Kuldeep at short third. Threw himself to his right to stop
shortish, thumped to wide long-off
works this against the turn towards deep midwicket
beaten as he looks to back away and swing. Good old slog, connected with the cold winter air.
backs away to pull, toe-ends it past the midwicket fielder
beaten as he looks to step out and cut this short ball

full, straight and gone! Backed away to go over mid-off but he was late on the shot. Thunderbolt at 147.5kph Surprised by the length. Looks like he was preparing himself for a length ball, saw this suddenly coming towards his stumps and by the time the bat came down, the timber had been knocked out.

throw at the wrong end? Run out missed. Tapped to point, Kusal called Oshada through and stopped. The throw should've been at the striker's end. Iyer could've still perhaps had him at the bowler's end too, needed a direct hit.
works this to midwicket
mistimes this slap to cover
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Perera, no run

Commentary: slows it down nicely, lunges forward and pushes to point
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Perera, no run

Commentary: works this into the gap at midwicket
works this to long-on
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to BOP Fernando, 1 run

Commentary: slog swept into the first tier at deep midwicket! Right length, immense power
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Perera, SIX runs

Commentary: good stop by Kohli at cover, this was absolutely smashed
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Perera, no run

Commentary: hit on the pad as he tries to tuck this square. Big appeal, may have been sliding down. Breached the 150kph mark
Commentary_short: Saini to BOP Fernando, no run

Commentary: hits him high on the bat as he tries to drive on the up, trickles to point. He's working up terrific pace
squeezes this yorker to cover, super bowling
full, straight and beaten on the slog. Backed away to heave, late on the shot. Hit on the pad by sheer pace
whipped to long leg
squeezes the yorker to mid-off
swept over short fine, one bounce to the fence. Walked across, helped that this was spinning in. Lovely pick-up shot
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to BOP Fernando, FOUR runs

Commentary: reverse sweep gone wrong, lobs in the air but doesn't carry to short third
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to BOP Fernando, 1 run

Commentary: swipes this one bounce to deep midwicket
tucks this towards the man coming in from deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to BOP Fernando, 1 run

Commentary: attempted slog, gets a thick inside edge onto the pad
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Perera, no run

Commentary: punched to long-off
steps out and whips him against the turn over deep midwicket. What a welcome
Commentary_short: Kuldeep Yadav to Perera, SIX runs

Commentary: flayed to deep point
beats him in the air and gone! Stepped out to heave, Kuldeep got this to drift away and beat the swing, Pant whips the bails off in a jiffy
Commentary_short: Kuldeep Yadav to BOP Fernando, OUT
Dismissal_text: BOP Fernando st †Pant b Kuldeep Yadav 10 (9b 1x4 0x6) SR: 111.11

Commentary: squirted off a thick inside edge to midwicket
Commentary_short: Kuldeep Yadav to Rajapaksa, no run

Commentary: walks across to sweep, this one drifts in further to beat the bat. Off Pant's pad to short fine. Not far from the stumps.
driven with the spin to long-off
slapped down to long-on
skiddy bouncer on the stumps, he stands tall and defends
dabs to point, looks for a single but is sent back
picked off his pads. Appeared to have got more elevation than power, but it still trickles away to the deep midwicket boundary even as wide long-on tried to hare across
mistimes the pull to fine leg
backs away and pulls, one bounce to deep midwicket

he's reverse pulled him for six! Short, but this came out off his hand very slowly, Kusal changed his grip and helped it along literally. Had all the time in the world because of the slowness off the pitch
Commentary_short: Kuldeep Yadav to Perera, SIX runs

Commentary: the thigh five from Dhawan at long-on! Deceived Kusal in flight as he stepped out, Kuldeep also tossed it wider so he had to reach out to the delivery, and because of that he didn't generate the same power. Dhawan had to move a fair but to his right, held on with the ropes within touching distance
Dismissal_text: MDKJ Perera c Dhawan b Kuldeep Yadav 34 (28b 0x4 3x6) SR: 121.42

Commentary: driven firmly to long-off, big gap there
fired full outside off, driven wide of cover point
swept into the gap at fine leg, this was the wrong'un but he picked it well
driven straight to cover
Commentary_short: Kuldeep Yadav to Shanaka, no run

Commentary: backs away and squeezes this full delivery to deep point, excellent work by Dhawan
flays to mid-off, has to put in a desperate dive to get into the crease at the bowler's end
slower and fuller on the stumps, defended to cover
beaten as he angles this length ball across, was looking to steer behind point

he's gloved this to the keeper! It's pure pace that gets him! Short at 144, on the body. Superbly directed, Rajapaksa had little time to get out of the way, went through with the pull and managed to glove. Got into a tangle, got steep.
Dismissal_text: PBB Rajapaksa c †Pant b Saini 9 (12b 1x4 0x6) SR: 75.00

Commentary: squeezes this full delivery into the leg side. Superb delivery
Commentary_short: Saini to DM de Silva, no run

Commentary: bunts this to long-on
googly which he drives to cover
Commentary_short: Kuldeep Yadav to DM de Silva, no run

Commentary: worked to the man coming in from deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Kuldeep Yadav to DM de Silva, 1 run

Commentary: punched to cover, misfield by Kohli on the dive allows the single
swept from outside off towards deep square, in between two fielders
Commentary_short: Kuldeep Yadav to DM de Silva, 2 runs

Commentary: cuts this googly into the gap at deep point. Dhawan covers a lot of ground from sweeper cover but dives over the ball. Ball was curving away from him as well, good effort nonetheless.
Commentary_short: Kuldeep Yadav to DM de Silva, FOUR runs

Commentary: tucks this incoming length ball to midwicket. 140.4kph
hops back into the crease and defends
Commentary_short: Bumrah to DM de Silva, no run

Commentary: looks to sway out of the way but hangs his bat out, lobs to square leg and towards the fielder in the deep
Commentary_short: Bumrah to DM de Silva, 1 run

Commentary: tucks this incoming length ball to midwicket
steered to square third man
Commentary_short: Bumrah to DM de Silva, 1 run

Commentary: hits top of off with a slower ball! Lovely change of pace, the batsman backed away to go over cover, completely deceived. This was bowled at 114kph
chipped to long-on
Commentary_short: Kuldeep Yadav to DM de Silva, 1 run

Commentary: thick edge as he shapes to drive, put down at slip. Kohli was moving to his right, had to change track and put his left hand out. Sharp chance put down

Commentary: punched to cover, then there's a deflection courtesy a direct hit at the keeper's end, they get a second too
Commentary_short: Kuldeep Yadav to DM de Silva, 2 runs

Commentary: goes straight down the ground, timed superbly to bisect long-off and long-on

Commentary: worked to the man coming in from deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Kuldeep Yadav to DM de Silva, 1 run

Commentary: picks the wrong'un, dabs this gently past short third
Commentary_short: Kuldeep Yadav to PWH de Silva, 1 run

Commentary: worked into the gap at midwicket
Commentary_short: Thakur to PWH de Silva, 1 run

Commentary: superb yorker-length delivery, looks to squeeze it through the infield but ends up chipping it straight to mid-off.
Commentary_short: Thakur to DM de Silva, OUT

Commentary: punched wide of cover for a quick single
right into the blockhole, squeezed to mid-off
Commentary_short: Thakur to PWH de Silva, 1 run

Commentary: deceived by the knuckleball that he delivers on a length, he backs away and looks to go over cover, ends up slicing it to the fielder inside the ring. Superb bowling.
Dismissal_text: I Udana c Saini b Thakur 1 (2b 0x4 0x6) SR: 50.00

Commentary: backs away to pull, Shardul follows him with a short ball to cramp him and the tame pull lobs straight to square leg.
Dismissal_text: SL Malinga c Kuldeep Yadav b Thakur 0 (1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

Commentary: squeezed to cover
Commentary_short: Bumrah to PWH de Silva, no run

Commentary: beaten for pace, looks to pull, hits the toe-end and bounces back to Bumrah
Commentary_short: Bumrah to PWH de Silva, no run

Commentary: can't get much bat on this, yorker-length on off, squeezed to cover
Commentary_short: Bumrah to PWH de Silva, no run

Commentary: lovely touch. Slower length ball outside off, he used the room to steer the ball into the gap.
Commentary_short: Bumrah to PWH de Silva, FOUR runs

Commentary: terrific! Backed away and thumped this full delivery to the extra cover boundary. Bumrah went for a yorker and just missed his length
Commentary_short: Bumrah to PWH de Silva, FOUR runs

Commentary: top-edge, Pan runs back but he has no chance. One bounce to the boundary to end the over.
Commentary_short: Bumrah to PWH de Silva, FOUR runs

Commentary: short of a length, nips away from outside off, and he can run this down towards third man
full, swings in, and starts around middle, going further down leg. Dhawan jams his bat down just in time to prevent that from clanging into his foot. Driven towards mid on
in-swinging yorker again, and Dhawan defends after getting his feet out of the way

slower ball, just outside off, and Dhawan charges down to meet it. Steers it past point, and to the left of third man. They run hard and manage to make it through for two. A better throw could have had him scampering back to the striker's end
inswinging yorker again, starts from around middle and tails down the leg side. Dhawan gets hit on the boot first, and then on to bat. Just squirts it away towards short mid-wicket
charges down to meet a fuller ball swinging in, and driven towards mid-off. There's a shy at the stumps, and no backing up! Bonus runs spoil what was a very good over from the captain
fast, full, and he looks to drive this, but it goes along the ground towards third man. Bowled at 147.1kph!
length, angles in, and he rides a bit of extra bounce on this to play it towards mid-wicket. Easy single on offer
fuller, and he looks to drive, and again it zips away along the grass to third man. This was delivered at 149kph!
short of a length, angles in, and he jumps to defend this close to his body
fuller, but on the pads, and he skews what looks like an attempted whip towards midwicket. Goes towards deep square leg
a touch short, outside off, and he hangs his bat out to run this down to third man

ooh, gorgeous! Malinga delivers this a touch wide of off, swinging further away, and Rahul just extends his front leg and drives through extra cover. Timed to perfection, and he held the pose for the shutterbugs too!
another cover drive, with the ball slightly wider this time. There's a good attempt by the man at cover-point to pull this back, but his foot has touched the rope!
length, straighter, and opens up Rahul a touch. Just a hint of movement away, and Rahul is squared up as he tries to defend. Played towards short cover
length, outside off, and he taps this down towards third man, bat close to body
Dhawan charges Malinga again, and drives a fuller ball at the stumps. Cut off by cover, moving swiftly to his left, but he cannot prevent a single

short of a length, and straight at Rahul, who hangs back and then whips it away towards deep mid-wicket. Some running around for the man stationed there, and that allows them to stroll through for the second
tossed up around off, and he drives this towards long-off
Commentary_short: DM de Silva to Dhawan, 1 run

Commentary: lovely shot! That's a length ball turning into him, and he just makes some room for himself, and then places this between cover and mid-off with surgeon-like precision
Commentary_short: DM de Silva to Rahul, FOUR runs

Commentary: deft! Runs one just outside off towards third man. Isuru Udana at short third man gets low down to his left to pull this back
Commentary_short: DM de Silva to Rahul, 2 runs

Commentary: ooh, that's ugly, but lucky! Fullish ball, and he looks to tonk this towards mid-wicket. Gets a top edge, but enough on it to go close to the third man boundary, where a fielder is able to cut it off
Commentary_short: DM de Silva to Rahul, 2 runs

Commentary: drives a length ball, turning in to him, towards long-on
Commentary_short: DM de Silva to Rahul, 1 run

Commentary: full, and he drifves this to long-off
Commentary_short: DM de Silva to Dhawan, 1 run

Commentary: a touch short, and he runs this down towards third man
slower ball, back of the hand, and Rahul picks it up. Plays this like he might a spinner, standing up tall, and punching this through covers. What a shot!

uppish, but in the gap between cover and cover-point. Kumara has a wry smile on his face. This was another chang up, fuller, and almost extracted the mistake from Rahul. But the Indian opener has activated his cheat code tonight!
dug in short, and he looks to pick it up from outside off. Hits it hard on to the ground just near his foot
sharp, short ball, and Rahul looks to pull this away. Off his midriff, and towards third man. He nearly topples over, but does well to stay away from his stumps. This will smart his ribs for a while!
slower ball, a touch wide of off, and Dhawan cannot lay bat on it with a swat
fuller ball, driven to the left of long-on
Commentary_short: DM de Silva to Rahul, 1 run

Commentary: fuller ball, and he looks to swat this through mid-wicket. Fails to get it away cleanly, and that's also a missed stumping, as the ball nicks the pads and runs towards fine leg
Commentary_short: DM de Silva to Dhawan, 1 bye

Commentary: drives a length ball to covers
Commentary_short: DM de Silva to Rahul, no run

Commentary: nurdles a length ball away towards mid-wicket
Commentary_short: DM de Silva to Rahul, 1 run

Commentary: uses his feet and slaps a length ball outside off towards long-on
Commentary_short: DM de Silva to Dhawan, 1 run

Commentary: full ball, and he drives this back down the wicket. A slight misfield in his follow-through from the bowler, and the ball ricochets away towards long-on
Commentary_short: DM de Silva to Rahul, 1 run

Commentary: length, outside off, angles in. Shanaka appeals, as Rahul plays it away towards point. He believes that got pad first, but the replays indicate it was bat only, in fact
length ball, driven to the right of cover. He scrambles away to save the ball from crossing the inner ring, but they get a single anyway
short, wide, and he swats this hard towards deep point
fuller, and he drives this hard down the wicket. Long-on gets across to his left, and keeps it down to two
shorter in length, and he drives this towards cover-point. Slower through the air as well
length, angles in, and he plays this towards deep mid-wicket
a little short, turning a bit further away, and he drives this towards deep extra cover
Commentary_short: PWH de Silva to Rahul, 1 run

Commentary: flighted around middle, and he stretches forward to steer this towards deep mid-wicket
Commentary_short: PWH de Silva to Dhawan, 1 run

Commentary: length, and he goes back and punches this with the turn away from him towards deep extra cover
Commentary_short: PWH de Silva to Rahul, 1 run

Commentary: ooh, tetchy Dhawan! Skips down the wicket, and plays a ball turning in off the inside edge, on to pads. Luckily, it trundles along, and he can get back into the crease, before it is collected
Commentary_short: PWH de Silva to Dhawan, no run

Commentary: drives a length ball towards the man sweeping at the extra cover fence
Commentary_short: PWH de Silva to Dhawan, 1 run

Commentary: drives this back towards the bowler
Commentary_short: PWH de Silva to Rahul, no run

Commentary: dug in short, but down the leg side, and Dhawan gets inside the line and helps it along towards the fine leg fence. Not off the middle, but fine leg was anyway inside the circle, so they are able to pick up two for that
slower ball, around middle and off, and he drives this towards mid-off
short, and he swats this away towards deep square leg. There's a man at the fence there, and this gets to him after one bounce
slower ball, on the pads, and he waits before whipping this away towards deep square leg
ooh, this goes through Malinga! Innocuous length ball, bashed towards Malinga at mid-off. He has to move a touch to his right, but that goes right through his feet
slower ball, on the pads, and he looks to flog this towards mid-wicket. Bat misses ball completely

Rahul is the first to go! Fails to pick Hasaranga's googly, delivered from wide of the crease. Comes down the wicket, with an intent of going inside out, possibly. Ends up swinging at thin air, and that goes on and just strikes the top of off. Hasaranga raises his index finger in celebration. A scratchy, yet entertaining Rahul innings comes to an end
Commentary_short: PWH de Silva to Rahul, OUT
Dismissal_text: KL Rahul  b PWH de Silva 45 (32b 6x4 0x6) SR: 140.62

Commentary: a little short in length, and he goes back and carts this away towards deep backward point. The man at the point fence has to zip around to his left
Commentary_short: PWH de Silva to Iyer, 2 runs

Commentary: length, and he goes back and plays this towards mid-wicket
Commentary_short: PWH de Silva to Iyer, 1 run

Commentary: length, and he goes back and flicks this towards deep mid-wicket
Commentary_short: PWH de Silva to Dhawan, 1 run

Commentary: length, googly, and he goes back and drives this towards long-on
Commentary_short: PWH de Silva to Iyer, 1 run

Commentary: tossed up around off, and flayed away towards deep point
Commentary_short: PWH de Silva to Dhawan, 1 run

Commentary: length, on the pads, and he whips this towards deep mid-wicket
slower ball, around off, and he taps this with soft hands ahead of point and calls his partner through for a quick single
short, outside off, and he whips this away towards deep square leg
length, around off, and he drives this hard, but straight back towards the bowler. Shanaka stops it with his right hand
slower ball, around the pads, and Iyer whips it away towards fine leg. The man at short fine leg has done well to dive away to his left and scramble it close to himself

short, and this time he has placed this to the left of deep square leg. Does well to bend a bit more and get outside the line of that ball, after which it was virtually more of a standing lap shot. Well played, Shikhar!
tossed up, around off, and he taps this wide of point for an easy single
Commentary_short: PWH de Silva to Iyer, 1 run

Commentary: this could be close! Sri Lanka refer after there's a leg-before appeal turned down as Dhawan misses a sweep that looks quite adjacent. A big stride forward, no doubt, but this straightens after pitching around middle. No inside edge, either. Pitches inline, impact inline, and three reds as it just nicks the leg stump. Hasaranga has struck again!
Commentary_short: PWH de Silva to Dhawan, OUT
Dismissal_text: S Dhawan lbw b PWH de Silva 32 (29b 2x4 0x6) SR: 110.34

Commentary: googly, delivered from outside off, and he preses forward to defend
Commentary_short: PWH de Silva to Kohli, no run

Commentary: runs this down towards long-on
Commentary_short: PWH de Silva to Kohli, 1 run

Commentary: length, turns away, and he drives towards cover
Commentary_short: PWH de Silva to Iyer, no run

Commentary: length, just outside off, and he drives this through the infield towards the sweeper at cover
Commentary_short: PWH de Silva to Iyer, 1 run

Commentary: slower ball, outside off, and Iyer plays it off the back foot, running it down to third man
higher in pace, just outside off, and Kohli can run this down towards third man
slower ball, and off the bat on to body. It drops right by Iyer, and Kohli calls him through for a quick run
shorter, and he goes outside of the line of this with a neat, little shuffle, and gets it down to fine leg
oh, pinpoint yorker. Iyer does well to keep this out!
short ball, slower through the air, and Iyer is able to watchfully run this down to third man
swift, short, angles in to Iyer, and he is able to keep this down. Takes his bottom hand off, and the ball pops up but lands short of point
drives a fuller ball towards long-on
short ball, and he plays this away with a roll of the wrists towards deep square leg
a bit short of a length, and he defends this towards short mid-wicket
shot! Fullish, fast ball, and he just smashes this back down the wicket. If Kumara had gotten a hand to it, he might have either caught this, or injured a finger in his bowling arm
ducks under a short one around off and middle
slower ball, around off, and he drives this hard, but fielded by cover
short, slower ball, and he guides this down towards deep backward square leg
fuller ball, and he looks to drive. Gets an inside edge, towards short fine leg. They take on the fielder there and get through for a single
skips down the wicket to drive a length ball down to long-on
slower ball, outside off, and he swings this towards deep mid-wicket
slower ball, and he moves across to take it from around off, and whip it towards deep mid-wicket. Wants two for it, but the fielder is fast to converge on this
Hasaranga's first ball back is met with a fierce swipe down towards deep mid-wicket. Would have wanted to get under that
Commentary_short: PWH de Silva to Kohli, 1 run

Commentary: Iyer is able to get under the ball, and flog it towards long-off. Raw power, once he got to the pitch of that with a little stretch forward
Commentary_short: PWH de Silva to Iyer, FOUR runs

Commentary: goes back to a slider, and plays it firmly towards long-on
Commentary_short: PWH de Silva to Iyer, 1 run

Commentary: length, driven towards long-off
Commentary_short: PWH de Silva to Kohli, 1 run

Commentary: length, and he slog sweeps this and gets it to the deep mid-wicket fence, What Kohli might have been looking to do off the first ball
Commentary_short: PWH de Silva to Iyer, FOUR runs

Commentary: ooh, hello THERE! A little shimmy brings him close to the ball, and he has sent this to the roof of the stadium. Smashed over long-on
Commentary_short: PWH de Silva to Iyer, SIX runs

Commentary: slower ball, around leg stump, and he runs it down towards fine leg. Just a little nudge, and it keeps it to the right of short fine leg
short, and he rocks back and swings this hard towards deep square leg. Gunathilaka gets down low to his left and cuts this off and saves two for his team
ooh, smacks a short ball over the long leg fence! Don't think he was in complete control, but he knew the fielder was much squarer, and hence made no effort to keep it down
whips a fuller ball around middle disdainfully towards the deep mid-wicket fence. Two runs on offer
fuller ball, and driven towards deep mid-wicket
slower ball, and he goes back and drives this towards deep mid-wicket

gets his man with a short ball! Smart bowling, as he digs this in short, but leaves it outside off, inviting Iyer to take him on. This was always going to be difficult to control, especially with the kind of pace Kumara generates, and that takes it to deep square leg's safe hands
Dismissal_text: SS Iyer c Shanaka b Kumara 34 (26b 3x4 1x6) SR: 130.76

Commentary: greets him with a shortish ball, but not enough to go around his shoulder. Pant wafts it away, across the line, towards deep square leg

ooh, finished in style! Kohli gets inside the line of a short ball, and then whips it on one leg over the long leg fence. Meeting fire with fire, in every respect. Punches gloves with the non-striker, and now acknowledges the congratulations from the opposition players
